choose.when: INSERT INTO user (email, password, nickname, activated , img_url) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, 1 , #{img_url})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO user (email, nickname, activated , img_url , sns_id) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, 1 , #{img_url} , #{sns_id})

mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE sns_id = #{sns_id}
SELECT user_id, password FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT user_id AS userId, nickname, img_url, img_name, description, sns_id AS snsId FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) AS postCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) AS commentCount
